prerequisite: Genasi, causticsoul elemental manifestation, watersoul elemental manifestation
name: Soul of Erosion
text: The soul of erosion combines the two most insinuating elements: water and its destructive cousin acid. Those who pursue this path perfect a devastating fighting style that sweeps foes aside even as it sears them.

features.erosionAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift half your speed before or after the action
features.unionOfBlessedAndCursedWaters(11thLevel): You manifest both watersoul and causticsoul at the same time when you manifest either one
features.flowingMovement(16thLevel): You are insubstantial while you are moving

flavorText: I am of that which digs and dissolves. I tear away and destroy, and you are next.
